name: All preline services & passive fire (where required) completed, area accessible and substrate acceptable
Consider bracing, adhesive/sealant & lining layer(s) requirements (consider fire stopping between layers)
Services/penetrations, correctly formed & located (consider cut-out tolerances where applicable)
Correct fixing pattern/sealant (consider fire)/adhesive/layers installed to align with consented design and specifications
Any bracing elements completed to design specification
All lining(s) completed correctly to specification & level of finish acceptable in respective area(s)
